alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:08AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern York, central Hamilton, southwestern Merrick and southwestern Polk Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 507 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marquette, or 15 miles east of Grand Island, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hampton and Hordville around 525 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Polk and Bradshaw. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 324 and 330. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for south central and east central Nebraska.
